title: Draft Pick on OCE
body:
Look, I know what you're all about to say
1. People don't want to wait in long champion selections only to be dodged
2. The queue times would be unhealthy

But honestly, I don't give a damn if the queue times are unhealthy. I want draft, I'll wait all I like, and also, just remove blind, it was stupid to begin with, put in draft but without the ban phase, or at the very least bring back team-builder.
I am sick and tired of people fighting over a role, and in the end leaving me at bottom lane all by myself, or with someone that doesn't know how to play as an ADC.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=36XIhKXs,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-08T23:17:44.446+0000)
>
> Draft pick aint gonna happen.

ye bruh
At the time i said that riot were still firmly saying no draft pick. So i wasn't wrong.
And this one was only a test. They could still decide the numbers don't add up
